items.title: How New York City’s Trees and Shrubs Help Clear Its Air
items.abstract: As advocates are pushing the city to plant more trees, new research shows the role of urban greenery in absorbing carbon emissions.

items.title: In Jewelry Design, the Beauties of Nature
items.abstract: Christian Dior, Boucheron, Chanel and DeBeers were among the houses showing haute joaillerie collections during the couture season.

items.title: Bringing Nature Back to the Urban Core
items.abstract: Our photographers set out to explore three cities that are seeking to restore their connection to nature by reclaiming land for green space.

items.title: Even on Urban Excursions, Finding Mother Nature's Charms
items.abstract: Nature should and can fit into your next city getaway. Here are some tips on how to make it happen.

items.title: Designed for Serenity, With Nature in Mind
items.abstract: Vo Trong Nghia’s firm meditates every day, which helps in their approach to refining urban environments.
